io.micronaut.context.condition

Interface ConditionContext<T extends AnnotationMetadataProvider>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type
    All Superinterfaces:
    BeanLocator, PropertyResolver, ValueResolver<java.lang.String>

    public interface ConditionContext<T extends AnnotationMetadataProvider>
extends BeanLocator, PropertyResolver
    The ConditionContext passed to a Condition.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
